Name: Halis Karaveli
Headline: View Halis Karaveli’s profile
Experience Summary:
**Halis Karaveli**  
*Data Scientist & Bioinformatician*  
*Cambridge, Massachusetts, United States*

Halis Karaveli is an experienced data scientist and bioinformatician with a strong background in developing bioinformatics pipelines and machine learning models. He has demonstrated expertise in statistical modeling for CRISPR-based Alzheimer's disease detection and enhancing data accessibility through user-friendly databases. With skills in data science, molecular biology, and genetics, he effectively utilizes tools like Python and AWS for innovative solutions.

His professional journey includes significant accomplishments at the Genoks Genetics Center, where he improved diagnostic yield by 80% and increased case resolution rates by 75%. He also has hands-on experience from internships focused on variant interpretation in genetic disorders.

Halis is currently pursuing a Master of Science in Data Science and Analytics at New England College and has recently completed various relevant courses, including machine learning and genomic data science. He volunteers as an Ambassador for science events, emphasizing networking and community engagement. In his free time, he enjoys exploring nature and reading science fiction.
Curated Cold Message: Hi Halis, I'm Louis, an MSBA student interested in ML and DS. I'm impressed by your work in CRISPR and AWS. Would love to connect and learn more about your experiences at Genoks and your studies in data science. Looking forward to exchanging ideas and insights!
